Comment: The USA is missing a huge opportunity. The country has a ready supply of cheap labor at its borders, just waiting for the opportunity to work. It could institute a migrant labor minimum wage and taxation system, and double the $100 billion that immigrants contribute annually in taxes. But instead, we have a short-sighted, racist authoritarian in office.
Author: JFJinCO
